comment: Rather give birth to a rhino...        -_-

I don't know what everyone else is talking about professor ramsay was is a great teacher. No the class isn't easy,but if you work it isn't that hard. She gives alot of work and expects alot and I think that she prepares you very well.Plus I got an A in the class and all I had to do it my work...plus isn't that the key to teaching....

The class was a train wreck. We had a few big projects (nothing new in Education classes).  Projects were graded HARSHLY, I'm talking failing grades on projects that were done exactly the way they were instructed to be done (and better...I'm a perfectionist). I've never made below a B on anything...this class changed that. Just dont do it....

She constantly had expectations for the class that she either did not communicate or uphold herself.  Avoid her class if at all possible, but if you are stuck with her just be an over achiever and you should do all right.
Evil, evil woman.  Very self-absorbed and not the least bit understanding.  She has a attitude and thinks she's better than everyone.  Its easy to get an A but you won't learn anything.
She is a hooriable teacher.  All she does is talk about her family.  It took here a month to return our projects.  She is not very undrstanding and professional.

This class was pathetic! She'd spend the first 15 minutes telling the class what her daughter was up to, then the next 10 minutes chewing out the class for not doing the assignment like she wanted it.  Of course, she never explained anything well enough for you to know what to do.  Absolutely awful teacher!
She was AWSOME! It was her first class at Kennesaw so she was a little confused but it was a great class...lots of talking.

Don't take this lady. Pretends to be your friend but isn't.  Says she's smarter than any student-that's why SHE is the teacher. Very unclear with instructions/then swears she was. She rambles on and on about herself during class. Seems to be very impressed with herself. Don't take this prof. You won't learn.

Ms.Ramsay was such a great professor. She was a bit unclear about some assignments but when she was unclear, she was leanient on the grading, & you weren't held accountable. She is opinionated but VERY open minded. She works well with you on due dates & gives time off if she feels it's deserved/needed. So sweet and wonderful- take her if you can.
